cards.rules_text:
Menace
[i]Intro[/i] — Deal 3 damage to up to X different targets, where X is equal to the number of times you've cast a commander this game.
[i]Outro [/i]— Commander creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Flying, First strike
[i]Intro[/i] — Put a feather counter on Changli, Eternal Blaze.
Whenever Changli, Eternal Blaze deals combat damage, put a Forte counter on it.
[i]Outro[/i] — Deal X damage to each opponent X times, where X is the number of Forte counters on Changli, Eternal Blaze.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Lifelink
[i]Intro[/i] — Target player gains 2 life.
[i]Outro[/i] — Put a +1/+1 counter on target commander creature you control for each life gained this turn.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Hexproof
[i]Intro[/i] — You gain hexproof until your next upkeep.
[i]Outro[/i] — Copy target Intro ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Lifelink
[i]Intro[/i] — Choose a player. Whenever damage is dealt to that player, gain 2 life until end of turn.
[i]Outro [/i]— Put a lifelink, reach, trample, or vigilance counter on target commander creature you control.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

First strike
[i]Intro[/i] — Camellya, Sanguine Blossom fights up to one target creature you don't control.
Whenever Camellya, Sanguine Blossom kills a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on it, and Camellya, Sanguine Blossom fights up to one target creature you don't control.
[i]Outro[/i] — Lose X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Camellya, Sanguine Blossom.
Resonator

Flying, Vigilance
[i]Intro [/i]— Put a Forte counter on Jinhsi, Thawborn Renewal. 
Whenever Jinhsi, Thawborn Renewal deals combat damage, put two Forte counters on it.
[i]Outro [/i]— Deal X damage to target player, where X is equal to twice the number of Forte counters on Jinhsi, Thawborn Renewal.
Resonator

Defender
[i]Intro [/i]— Put a shield counter on target creature you control.
[i]Outro[/i] — Put a shield counter on target commander creature you control.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Flash
[i]Intro[/i] — Tap X creatures and put a stun counter on them, where X is equal to the number of times you've cast a commander this game.
[i]Outro[/i] — Commander creatures you control gain “This creature can't be blocked” until the beginning of your next end step.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

First strike
[i]Intro[/i] — Pay X life, where X is equal to the amount of mana spent to cast Danjin, Scarlet Shade.
Danjin, Scarlet Shade enters the battlefield with Y +1/+1 counters on it, where Y is equal to the amount of life you lost this turn. 
[i]Outro[/i] — Gain life equal to Danjin, Scarlet Shade's power.
Resonator

[i]Intro[/i] — Put a first strike, hexproof, menace, or vigilance counter of your choice on Brant, Flamebound Compass.
[i]Outro[/i] — For each keyword counter on Brant, Flamebound Compass, put those counters on target commander creature you control.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Lifelink
[i]Intro[/i] — Create X 1/1 blue Jellyfish creature tokens with flying, where X is equal to the number of times you've cast a commander this game.
[i]Outro[/i] — For each Jellyfish you control, goad target creature you don't control.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Reach
[i]Intro[/i] — Create two Shard tokens. [i](They're enchantments with “{2}, Sacrifice this token: Scry 1, then draw a card.”)[/i]
[i]Outro[/i] — For each Shard token you control, copy target Intro ability you control. You may choose new targets for the copy.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Prowess
[i]Intro[/i] — Exile up to one target instant or sorcery from your graveyard, then deal damage equal its mana value to any target.
[i]Outro[/i] — You may cast cards exiled with Xiangli Yao, Matter Weaver without paying their mana cost. 
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

[i]Intro[/i] — For each opponent, exile up to one target creature that player controls. 
[i]Outro[/i] — Put all creatures exiled from Phoebe, Graceful Luminescence onto the battlefield under your control unless target player pays X life, where X is equal to the total mana value of creatures exiled by Phoebe, Graceful Luminescence.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Haste
[i]Intro[/i] — Exile the top X cards of your library, where X is equal to the number of times you've cast a commander this game. You may play them until end of turn.
[i]Outro[/i] — Target commander creature you control deals damage equal to its power to each other creature.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Lifelink
[i]Intro [/i]— For each opponent, create a Blood, Clue, Food, Junk, Map, or 1/1 colorless Clown Robot creature token.
[i]Outro[/i] — Until end of turn, opponents cannot cast spells. [i](Spells cast before this resolves are unaffected.)[/i]
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Menace
[i]Intro[/i] — Lose 1 life and draw a card.
[i]Outro[/i] — Exile target card from each opponent's graveyard. 
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

[i]Intro[/i] — The next resonator you cast has flash. 
[i]Outro[/i] — End the turn. [i](Exile all spells and abilities. The player whose turn it is discards down to their maximum hand size. Damage heals and “this turn” and “until end of turn” effects end.)[/i]
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Vigilance
[i]Intro[/i] — Until the start of your next turn, Sanhua, Snow Waltz has “Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays 2 for each creature they control that's attacking you.”
[i]Outro[/i] — Target commander creature gains “Double all damage this creature would deal.”
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Reach
[i]Intro[/i] — Choose a keyword, creatures lose that keyword and can't have or gain it until end of turn.
[i]Outro[/i] — Add {G}{G}{G} to your mana pool.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Reach
[i]Intro[/i] — Chixia, Gallant Blaze enters the battlefield with X Forte counters on it, where X is equal to the number of times you've played a commander card this game.
Chixia, Gallant Blaze has +1/0 for each Forte counter on it.
[i]Outro[/i] — Deal X damage to target player and each creature they control, where X is the number of Forte counters on Chixia, Gallant Blaze.
Resonator

Rover, Havoc costs {1} less for each time you've cast a commander this game.
[i]Intro[/i] — Rover, Havoc enters the battlefield with X Forte counters on it, where X is equal to the number of times you've cast a commander this game.
If Rover, Havoc has at least 6 Forte counters on it, it gains flying, vigilance, menace, lifelink, and indestructible.
[i]Outro[/i] — Rover, Havoc deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker.
Resonator

Wither [i](This deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters.)[/i]
[i]Intro[/i] — Each player chooses a number of lands equal to the number of lands controlled by the player who controls the fewest, then sacrifices the rest. 
[i]Outro[/i] — Return all land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

First strike, Menace
[i]Intro[/i] — Calcharo, Phantom Hunters deals damage equal to its power to target player or planeswalker.
[i]Outro[/i] — Create an X/X black Phantom legendary creature token with first strike, menace, and “This creature must attack each turn if able. Where X is equal to Calcharo, Phantom Hunters's power/
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

First strike, menace
Phantom must attack each turn if able.

[i]Intro[/i] — Create X soldier creature tokens, where X is equal to the amount of mana spent to cast Jiyan, Midnight Ranger General. 
Jiyan, Midnight Ranger General gains +1/+1 for each soldier creature token. 
[i]Outro[/i] — For each soldier creature token you control, you may draw a card and gain 1 life.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

[i]Intro[/i] — Tap target creature and put a stun counter on it.
[i]Outro[/i] — Draw a card then discard a card for each tapped creature you don't control.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

[i]Intro[/i] — Target creature deals damage to itself equal to its power.
[i]Outro[/i] — Target commander creature you control gains “You may exert this creature as it attacks. When you do, it gains double strike.” 
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

First strike
[i]Intro[/i] — Put a shield counter on yourself. [i](If you would be dealt damage, remove a shield counter instead.)[/i]
[i]Outro[/i] — Put a first strike counter on target commander creature you control.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Flash 
[i]Intro[/i] — Exile target spell. It's owner my cast it for as long as it remains in exile.
[i]Outro[/i] — Spells exiled from Aalto, Mistcloak Strike are flipped upside down and can no longer be cast.

[i]Intro[/i] — Put an indestructible counter on Jianxin, Cleansing Reflections. 
At the beginning of your end step, remove all counters on Jianxin, Cleansing Reflections.
[i]Outro[/i] — For each counter on Jianxin, Cleansing Reflections, put those counters on target commander creature you control.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]

Flying
When Sentinel Jue, Jinzhou Sentinel enters the battlefield, put each commander creature you own from your command zone onto the battlefield tapped. 
When Sentinel Jue, Jinzhou Sentinel is put into the graveyard from anywhere, its owner shufflers their graveyard into their library.

Menace
[i]Intro [/i]— Each opponent reveals their hand. For each opponent, choose up to one card with mana value 3 or less. That player discards that card.
[i]Outro [/i]— Exile up to one target card from each graveyard.
Resonator [i](You can have three commanders if all three have resonator.)[/i]
Outro abilities of commander creatures you control trigger twice.
